entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
